# NSTextBlock.Layer.border

**Case**

The border of the text block.

## Declaration

```swift
case border
```

## Discussion

There’s space between padding and margin, typically with color, to present a visible boundary.

## Constants

- **NSTextBlock.Layer.padding**: Padding of the text block: space surrounding the content area extending to the border.
- **NSTextBlock.Layer.margin**: Margin of the text block: space surrounding the border.
